markdownRemark.html:
When programming, it helps to tackle some of the more difficult aspects of software development by learning design patterns. Becca Nelson, 8th Light Software Crafter, speaks to how to use these patterns on your path towards building better, and more maintainable, software solutions.

Read on the 8th Light blog

frontmatter.title: Two Design Patterns You're Probably Already Using
frontmatter.description: When programming, it helps to tackle some of the more difficult aspects of software development by learning design patterns. Becca Nelson, 8th Light Software Crafter, speaks to how to use these patterns on your path towards building better, and more maintainable, software solutions.
